Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
This is the name of a unit.

"My girlfriend calls it Karma. She got me into all that vegan stuff. Unfortunately, it’s a dog-eat-dog world. Or in this case, a people-eat-mushroom, then the mushrooms-eat-people world. Not sure why or how, but mushrooms got into the fertilizer dispenser-bots. Now they’re smart. They have control of the bots, roaming the land, seeking to turn us all into fertilizer so they can grow and spread their mushrooms like wildfire. They eat us, and when we can take one down, we eat them. I never should’ve given up on bacon.” – Diego Tortuga, “RV-554361E: Live Your Best Life"

“我的女朋友把它称为因果报应。她让我吃了很多素食。不幸的是，这是一个‘人吃人’的世界，或者在这种情况下，应该称为‘人吃蘑菇’的世界，然后又变成了‘蘑菇吃人’的世界。蘑菇不知为何以某种方式进入了施肥机器人，它们很聪明，控制机器人到处游荡，试图把我们都变成肥料，从而让它们自己像野火燎原一样迅速生长和扩散。它们会吃掉我们。而当我们干掉它们时，我们也会吃掉它们。我当初就不应该戒掉吃培根的习惯。”——迭戈·托尔图加，“RV-554361E：享受最好的生活”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
The person of the quote is male
This is the name of a unit.

"Dear Helix Drone Farming, I don’t usually complain, but I feel you should be informed that your products appear to be defective. This regards the Hover Sprayer-66 Drone. I understand drones go missing, but these appear to be swarming. They’re hunting people now, spraying my workers with blinding toxic mist rather than my crops. They’re very popular with certain mushroom strains. I’m beginning to think they’ve got a mind of their own. Please refund my money, and maybe send some troops to hunt down your defective units before they kill us all? Thanks.” –Derwood Mycon, Farmer “RV-488385C: Complaint Department Memos"

“亲爱的螺旋无人机农业公司，我不是那种经常投诉的人，但这一次我必须要说，你们的产品似乎存在缺陷。没错，就是盘旋喷雾器-66 型无人机。我知道无人机可能会失踪，但它们似乎成群结队在行动。现在，它们甚至开始捕猎人类，把本该喷向庄稼的农药喷在我工人的脸上。它们在某些蘑菇品种中很受欢迎，我开始觉得它们有自己的想法了。请把钱退给我，然后能不能派一些部队去干掉你们的缺陷产品，免得它们把我们都给杀光了？谢谢。”——德尔伍德·麦康，农夫，“RV-488385C：投诉部门备忘录”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
The person of the quote is male
This is the name of a unit.

"Upon arrival on Parma Rigella IV, our landing crew located a still functioning biofarm from the Star Union Agricultural ministry. The Planter bots combed fields flowing with rich crops of edible herbs and fungus. We entered the personnel center to begin negotiations with the farmers, only to discover a horrible sight. The crew of the station was dead, covered in fungal growths. That’s when we realized the mushroom-encrusted Planter bots were not being directed, but had become sentient, had followed us, and sought to use us as fertilizer.” – Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-:09432567T: When Your Food Wants to Kill You."

“我们的登陆人员在抵达帕尔玛里基拉 IV 号星球时，发现了一个仍在运转的星际联盟农业部生态农场。种植机器人正在那里打整田野，肥沃的土地上满是可食用的草药和真菌作物。我们进入人事中心与农民谈判，却发现了可怕的一幕。站点内的工作人员已经全部死亡，身上长满了真菌。就在那时，我们意识到，那些身披蘑菇外壳的种植机器人并不是受到控制，而是自己变得有了知觉，它们在跟踪我们，并试图将我们做成肥料。”——玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-:09432567T：当你的食物想要杀了你时。”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
The person of the quote is male
This is the name of the wildlife race. Singular.
This is the name of the wildlife race. Plural.
